VoiceList.Entry: Tifa “What!?”
Tifa “This was all burnt down,wasn't it?”
Cloud “…I thought so.”
Tifa “Then why… My house is still here too…”
Barret “The hell's goin' on!? This a dream or somethin'?”
Aeris “…Something's strange?”
Red XIII “I wonder what's going on…”
Cait Sith “Cloud,maybe you were just dreaming…?”
Cid “Hey,it isn't like what you told me!”
Yuffie “What the…?”
Barret “You said the whole town burnt down,right?”
Aeris “This is Nibelheim,right? But the town's all here.”
Red XIII “This is Nibelheim? I heard it burnt down.”
Cait Sith “The whole town was destroyed by Sephiroth. At least that's what I heard…”
Cid “Didn't you say that your hometown burned down?”
Yuffie “I thought someone said this town burnt down!”
Cloud “…Yeah.”
Barret “You tryin' to fool us?”
Aeris “Hey,what's going on?”
Red XIII “Cloud… Did you lie to us?”
Cait Sith “Cloud,did you make up that story just to get our support?”
Cid “Yo,Cloud. It's not good to lie.”
Yuffie “What happened?”
Cloud “I'm not lying!”
Cloud “I remember…the intense heat of the flames…”
“Wooow… He's…calling…Sephiroth… is…calling…”
“The…Great…Se…phi…roth… is…near…"
“In…side…inside…the Mansion… Urrrrrrrgh…the great…Sephi…roth”
“Great…Sephi…roth… …left us…”
“Over…mountains… …gone…”
